body:
Im going to be making a profile picture and channel art in Cinema 4d and photoshop.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZwOGFl5G6vA
RULES:
1. Subscribe
2. Like the video
3. Comment "done" on video
Thats it! Winner will be drawn on Feb. 8th.
Good luck!
